short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate passwords using randomness from Cloudflare's edge servers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension generates secure passwords, using random data from Cloudflare edge servers. With this extension you can easily generate strong and secure passwords. The password generated is not saved anywhere, locally or remotely: you need to copy the string to clipboard when they are generated. 

In the options, you can select the size of the generated password.
